sentences.en: Antidiuretic prescriptions can reduce nighttime urination.
sentences.cn: 抗利尿的处方可以减少夜间排尿。

sentences.en: A 2008 British study found that compared to getting more nighttime sleep, a mid-day nap was the best way to cope with the mid-afternoon sleepiness.
sentences.cn: 2008年英国的一项研究发现，与获得更多的夜间睡眠相比，午间小睡是应对午后困倦的最佳方式。

sentences.en: The ready availability of coal inspired William Murdoch during the 1790s to develop the first new form of nighttime illumination to be discovered in a millennium and a half.
sentences.cn: 威廉·默多克在18世纪90年代受到煤炭的易得性的启发，发明了1500年里的第一种新的夜间照明方式。
